section.name: WOLips
section.p: download install wizards popup manipulating the build process bugs and known issues inside WOLips

section.name: Bugs
section.p: Currently it is not possible to create projects with WOLips outside of the workspace.

section.name: Known Issues
section.p: There seems to be some problems with Java 1.4.
Please use a 1.4* version of ant to build wolips. There is currently no support for ant1.5.* within Eclipse.
